name: react-with-azure
description: A modern, cloud-native D&D campaign organizer for Dungeon Masters and players, featuring: - **React** frontend - **Node.js** microservices (REST and/or GraphQL API) - **AI integration** (Ollama) - **GraphQL API** for flexible data access - **Discord bot** for player/world interaction - **Azure** cloud services - **Kubernetes** orchestration
